A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Force Awakens\, while borrowing major plotlines from episode 4\, built a very strong cast of new characters\, intriguing storylines\, mysteries\, and captured the feel of the original star wars universe.\n\nThe Last Jedi unraveled all of that.  It decapitated many of the mysteries from the previous film while also introducing nothing original or exciting.  The entire plot of the film was a mess\, basically focusing on a leisurely space ship chase through space that in the end resulted in nothing.
